mapper.sql: ip ,ts,event, uuid,bizId,userAgent, mobile,browser,browserVersion, platform,os,osVersion, engine,engineVersion,referer, totalCount,eventDate,memberNo, memberType,mmCode,storeCode, channel,publishType,pageNo, pageUrl,isNew
mapper.select: select mmCode as mmcode, count(DISTINCT uuid) uv, count(DISTINCT bizId) pv from page_view_log where eventDate ${sql} group by mmCode
select mmcode, count() mv from (select mmCode as mmcode from page_view_log where eventDate ${sql} and memberNo != '' group by mmCode, memberNo) a group by a.mmcode

select mmCode, count(DISTINCT bizId) as pv from page_view_log where eventDate = ${sql}
AND channel = 'app'
AND channel != 'app'
group by mmCode

select mmcode, count() mv from (select mmCode as mmcode from page_view_log where eventDate = ${s} and memberNo != ''
AND channel = 'app'
AND channel != 'app'
group by mmCode, memberNo) a group by a.mmcode
select mmCode, channel, count(DISTINCT bizId) as value, count(DISTINCT uuid) as uv from page_view_log where eventDate = ${sql} group by mmCode, channel
select mmCode, memberType, count(DISTINCT uuid) as uv,count(DISTINCT bizId) as pv from page_view_log where eventDate = ${s} group by mmCode, memberType
select mmCode, count(DISTINCT bizId) as total from page_view_log pv where ts ${sql} GROUP BY mmCode
select mmCode, count(DISTINCT uuid) as total from page_view_log where ts ${sql} GROUP BY mmCode
select count(distinct memberNo) mv from page_view_log where eventDate = ${sql} and memberNo != ''
select mmCode, count(distinct uuid) newUv from page_view_log where eventDate = ${sql} and isNew = 1 group by mmCode
select count(distinct uuid) newUv from page_view_log where eventDate = ${sql} and isNew = 1

select mmCode, pageNo,channel, count(DISTINCT bizId) as pv, count(distinct uuid) as uv, count() as count, ${sql} date from page_view_log where eventDate = ${sql} and pageNo != '' group by mmCode, pageNo,channel

select mmCode, channel, memberType, count(DISTINCT bizId) as pv, count(distinct uuid) as uv, ${date} date from page_view_log where eventDate = ${date} and memberType != '' group by mmCode, channel, memberType
